channel.title: Confused...little help needed
channel.description:
Right, i've got the server, i've got hamachi running.
list of questions though:
1)When server starts it starts on 0.0.0.0, how would i go about changing this?
2)Do i NEED to have no-ip or servegame or can i just use hamachi?
Thanks.
